name: AdmittedStatus
title: Admitted Status
description: Whether a carrier is licensed (admitted) in a given jurisdiction to write coverage.

concept.definition: The carrier is licensed by the state or province and subject to its rate and form filings, and policies are backed by the guaranty fund.
The carrier is not licensed in the jurisdiction; coverage is placed through the surplus lines market.
The carrier writes business on both an admitted and non-admitted basis, often through affiliated entities.
